    • listDog

      public Dog listDog(String username, int id, boolean adopted)
      Lists or removes a listing for a dog
      Parameters:
      username - username of the user listing the dog
      id - id of the dog
      adopted - true if the dog is being listed, false if the listing is being removed

    • applyOrSave

      public SavedListings applyOrSave(String username, int id, boolean isApplying)
      Allows a user to apply for or save a dog to their favorites list
      Parameters:
      username - user that is applying/saving
      id - the dogs id that is being applied for / saved
      isApplying - true if it is an application, false if the dog is just being saved
      Returns:
      the created listing

    • approveApplication

      public boolean approveApplication(String username, int userId, int dogId)
      Approves an existing dog adoption application
      Parameters:
      username - Username of the approving user
      userId - Id of the user that is going to adopt the dog
      dogId - Id of the dog being adopted
      Returns:
      true if successful, false if it failed
